about_the_game:
Droid Wars is an exciting game featuring both local multiplayer deathmatch and single-player survival modes. In deathmatch, 1-4 players battle it out with customized bots. Each match lets players personalize their droid’s loadouts from a variety of weapons, each with unique strengths and weaknesses. Players must strategically manage their droid’s health, armor, and stamina to outlast their opponents. The goal is simple: be the last droid standing.

Featuring both PvP (Player vs. Player) and PvE (Player vs. Environment) elements, Droid Wars offers intense player battles and opportunities to defeat NPCs for valuable bonuses. These advantages include items that boost damage, speed, armor, and access to unique weapons. The single-player survival mode challenges players to endure waves of increasingly difficult enemies, testing their skills and strategy.
